name: Percy the Penguin Saves Christmas
description:
Percy the Penguin is a platformer designed to mimic old arcade games, such as "Mario Bros." and "Bubble Bobble". Throw snowballs at rogue Christmas toys to stun them, and touch them to wrap them in a present. Once every enemy is wrapped up, continue on to the next level! For 1-2 players.

Controls

On the main menu, press F for one player, or G for the tutorial. You can also use A/D to select if you want one or two player! In two player mode, you both share lives and score, so work together to survive!

Player 1: WASD to move, F to jump, G to attack

Player 2: UDLR to move, M to jump, N to attack

(In single player, both controls sets work for player 1)

Press Escape to pause.

Game by Adam Worrell Music by Lily Price
